sentences.pinyin: zhè ge gōng sī de guī mó hěn dà.
sentences.translation: The scale of this company is very large.

sentences.simplifiedText: 随着科技的发展，这个城市的规模也在不断扩大。
sentences.traditionalText: 隨著科技的發展，這個城市的規模也在不斷擴大。
sentences.pinyin: suí zhě kē jì de fā zhǎn , zhè ge chéng shì de guī mó yě zài bú duàn kuò dà .
sentences.translation: With the development of technology, the scale of this city is also constantly expanding.

sentences.simplifiedText: 他们要扩大公司的规模。
sentences.traditionalText: 他們要擴大公司的規模。
sentences.pinyin: tā men yào kuò dà gōng sī de guī mō.
sentences.translation: They want to expand the scale of the company.

sentences.simplifiedText: 面对疫情的威胁，我们必须全力以赴，扩大我们的应急响应规模。
sentences.traditionalText: 面對疫情的威脅，我們必須全力以赴，擴大我們的應急響應規模。
sentences.pinyin: miàn duì yì qíng de wēi xié ,wǒ men bì xū quán lì yǐ fù ,kuò dà wǒ men de yìng jí xiǎng yìng guī mō .
sentences.translation: Facing the threat of the epidemic, we must do our best to expand the scale of our emergency response.
